T02D2992:55a-0: @55a * // dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2992:55a-1: gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar bar 'dod na /
T02D2992:55a-2: sngon dus dang mtshan nyid shes par bya ste bram
T02D2992:55a-3: ze rgyal rigs kyi mi gzugs bzang ba dang mdzes
T02D2992:55a-4: pa la mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum dang yar gyi
T02D2992:55a-5: lnga la / skyed mos tshal dang 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2992:55a-6: lha rten nam grong gi 'dun sa rnams su 'dzin
T02D2992:55a-7: lnga la / par byed do // zhugs pa'i mtshan ma ni khro ba med pa du ba'ang med /
T02D2992:55a-9: gtsang sbra la dga' zhing mig gi tshogs 'khrul pa'o //
T02D2992:55a-10: de dag gso ba ni zas sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D2992:55a-20: gser la sogs te rin po che sna tshogs pa
T02D2992:55a-21: dang bcas pa'i gtor ma byang phyogs su sbyin par
T02D2992:55a-22: bya'o // de nas khrus byas te gro dang /
T02D2992:55b-0: sgog skya rnams cha bsnyams la @55b mar phul bzhi dang /
T02D2992:55b-1: 'o ma phul bzhi dang ba lang gi ko ba phul bzhi dang /
T02D2992:55b-2: ra'i chus btags la me chung bas btsos la nad pa rig sngags kyis khrus byas la /
T02D2992:55b-3: de dag la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la lus la byug / snar ldugs /
T02D2992:55b-5: ltor btang bas gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar bar nges so //
T02D2992:55b-6: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa /
